```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


    

## Introduction 
The data visualisation below is created by using data data on Resident Labour Force Participation Rate by Age and Sex.provided by Ministrty of Manpower, Singapore (MOM). 

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
